column3: Traffic;Kandal province: The explosion of a gas tank on the LEXUS GS470 sedan caused a huge fire and seriously injured a man.------The incident occurred at 1 pm on April 12
column5: on  the road leading into the Takhmao (Old Market) Street
column8: Kandal Province.------The burned man was sent to hospital
column9: but his condition looks critical.------The cause of the fire is not yet known.------Warning
